---
layout: docs
title: Order
description: null
---

| Class          | Description                 |
| -------------- | --------------------------- |
| `order-1`      | Sets `order: 1;` on element |
| `order-first`  | Sets `order: 1;` on element |
| `order-2`      | Sets `order: 2;` on element |
| `order-middle` | Sets `order: 2;` on element |
| `order-3`      | Sets `order: 3;` on element |
| `order-last`   | Sets `order: 3;` on element |
